meta.title: From SEANCE to MANOR
meta.author: Rita Orlov
meta.author_bio: Rita is an artist, maker, and puzzlesmith, best known for being the founder of PostCurious, a company specializing in narrative tabletop puzzle games. You can find more info about her games, along with some free online puzzles, at [getpostcurious.com](https://www.getpostcurious.com/).
meta.message: Today's Raddle is by Rita Orlov. Rita writes, "[The SÃ©ance of Blake Manor](https://store.steampowered.com/app/1395520/The_Sance_of_Blake_Manor/) is a supernatural detective mystery.  After arriving in a remote hotel full of otherworldly occurrences, you must investigate the disappearance of a specific guest, as well as uncover the secrets of many others. I enjoyed exploring the house, talking to the characters, and learning a little about Celtic mythology throughout the game. Many mysteries to unravel!"
